Male01_Torso_school_00_description
An orthodox school uniform top with a collar that wraps around the neck and is held in place with a small hook on the front.[#Legal]
Un haut d'uniforme d'écolier traditionnel à col haut, maintenu à l'avant par un petit crochet.[#Legal]
Eine orthodoxe Schuluniform mit einem um den Hals gewickelten Kragen. Dieser wird mit einem kleinen Haken an der Vorderseite in Position gehalten.[#Legal]
Classica uniforme scolastica con colletto alla coreana chiuso sul davanti da un gancetto.[#Legal]

首のまわりを覆い、襟の前をホックで締めて着るタイプの、オーソドックスな学生服の上着。[#Legal]
깃이 목 둘레를 감싸고, 옷깃의 앞을 단추로 잠궈 입는 타입의 정통적인 학생복 상의. [#Legal]
Orthodox-style school uniform top, with the collar covering the neck and fastened by a hook in the front.[#Legal]
